person.persName: James A. Baird (Harrison County, KY, farmer and magistrate)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Gabriella Huston Baird in Scott County, Kentucky, on November 23, 1852. Father of Mary Baird and Volney Baird. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Commissioned justice of the peace in Colemansville in June 1861.
